snippet.title: Figment 2: Creed Valley - Nintendo Switch Reveal Trailer | Indie World Showcase
snippet.description:
A puzzle adventure game where you fight your way through a human mind overcome by nightmares. Solve environmental puzzles or fight in musical boss battles in Figment 2. Coming February 2022.

#GameTrailers #Gaming
